title: The Boy Scouts' Year Book
additional-notes: Renewals for this annual were filed under Books, not Periodicals. Annuals in the 1930s and 1940s were typically titled 'The Boy Scouts Year Book of...' (e.g. '...of Ghost and Mystery Stories' for the 1933 Year Book).
Much of the material in this annual originally ran in Boys' Life, and may have active renewals filed under that magazine.
